author: GameSpot
description:
We got hands-on with three missions from Battlefield 6 and they all push the action to the extreme.

Credits: tamoor hussain, ben janca, richard li

#gamespot  #bf6
title: Battlefield 6’s Campaign Is Overwhelming in the Best Way

author: GameSpot
description: We got hands on with the Battlefield 6 Campaign and were given access to 3 different missions. Check out some gameplay from the various missions.
title: 6 Minutes of Battlefield 6 Single Player Campaign Gameplay

author: GameSpot
description: These are our biggest takeaways after playing 3 missions from Battlefield 6's campaign. EA seems to be pushing blockbuster set pieces to their very limits.
title: Battlefield 6 Campaign - Biggest Takeaways

author: GameSpot
description:
Sony State of Play concluded, and here are some of the biggest games from the show! Marvel's Wolverine premiered, with Logan slashing foes with his Adamantium claws.  Crimson Desert announced a release date. And Saros made its debut.

00:00 Marvel’s Wolverine
01:47 Battlefield 6 Official Campaign Trailer
03:19 Nioh 3
04:34 Crimson Desert 
06:14 Saros
11:11 Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 
12:28 Zero Parades - For Dead Spies
13:48 Deus Ex Remastered
14:18 Code Vein 2
15:47 Dynasty Warriors 3 Complete Edition Remastered
16:43 Chronoscript - The Endless End
title: Best PlayStation State of Play Trailers (September 2025)

author: GameSpot
description:
Witness the unstoppable power of Michael Myers with a first look at gameplay for Halloween. 
 
Become the Boogeyman or save the citizens of Haddonfield when Halloween launches on PlayStation 5 on September 8, 2026.
title: Halloween - Gameplay and Release Date Reveal | PS5 Games

author: GameSpot
description:
Join the teams from Insomniac Games and Marvel Games for a behind the scenes look at Marvel's Wolverine. 
 
 Set to launch on PlayStation®5 consoles Fall 2026.
title: Marvel’s Wolverine - Behind The Claws | PS5 Games

author: GameSpot
description:
The latest release in the dark Sengoku action RPG series, "Nioh."
 
Embark as Tokugawa Takechiyo, the protagonist forced from the shogunate throne, as he confronts his rebellious brother Tokugawa Kunimatsu in a battle that transcends time.
 
Launching on February 6, 2026.
title: Nioh 3 - Launch Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: GameSpot
description:
Become a living weapon. As he searches for answers about his past, Wolverine will do whatever it takes – unleashing brutal claw combat, violent rage, and relentless determination – to cut through the mystery of the man he used to be. 
 
 From Insomniac Games, the developers of the critically acclaimed Marvel’s Spider-Man franchise, comes Marvel’s Wolverine, an all-new take on an iconic character based on Marvel Comics. Developed in collaboration with Marvel Games and Sony Interactive Entertainment, Marvel’s Wolverine coming to PlayStation®5 consoles Fall 2026.
title: Marvel’s Wolverine - Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games

author: GameSpot
description: Campaign returns on a global scale. Step into Dagger 13, an elite squad of Marine Raiders, determined to stop Pax Armata in Battlefield 6’s single-player campaign. Storm the beaches of Gibraltar, take to the streets of Brooklyn for intense gunfights, perform a HALO jump into enemy territory, destruction, scale, and tight squad play shape every choice. Only in Battlefield.
title: Battlefield 6 - Campaign Trailer | PS5 Games

author: GameSpot
description:
This is Deus Ex Remastered – the definitive version of Ion Storm’s legendary cyberpunk immersive sim, modernized with visual upgrades, modern enhancements, and quality-of-life improvements for a new generation of operatives. 

The year is 2052. Societies are teetering on collapse, plagues spread unchecked, and shadow governments shape the future. You are JC Denton—a nano-augmented UNATCO operative tasked with protecting order. But the deeper you dig, the more lies you uncover. What begins as a mission becomes a fracture point in human history.
title: Deus Ex Remastered - Announce Trailer | PS5 Games

author: GameSpot
description: Watch the all-new Saros Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer here on GameSpot.
title: Saros Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
The upcoming swordplay action game from Capcom, Onimusha: Way of the Sword, has a brand new trailer: Musashi's Story.

Taking on the power of the Oni against his will, we take a closer look at Miyamoto Musashi's story and meet new characters who intertwine with it.

Coming to PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S, Steam in 2026!
title: Onimusha: Way of the Sword - Official 4th Trailer: Musashi's Story

author: GameSpot
description:
Enter the Shelter, your home base in PRAGMATA to upgrade and unlock your abilities, and much more. Build your arsenal and prepare for what awaits you on the lunar research station. 

Capcom’s newest IP—PRAGMATA. An all-new Science Fiction action adventure with its own unique hacking twist! It is the near future, and protagonists Hugh and his android companion Diana, must work together as they make their way through the cold lunar research station. 

PRAGMATA is coming to PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC/Steam in 2026. 

#PRAGMATA
title: PRAGMATA - Shelter Overview Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
Omega Planetes descends upon the Forbidden Lands in Free Title Update 3, heralding the arrival of the Monster Hunter Wilds x FINAL FANTASY XIV Online Special Collaboration!

FINAL FANTASY XIV Online themed weapons, armor, cosmetics, special actions and more await you from September 29! Plus, more Wilds content will drop throughout autumn, including the Festival of Accord: Dreamspell, Arch-Tempered Nu Udra and new Event Quests with cosmetic rewards!

Monster Hunter Wilds is the next generation of the acclaimed Monster Hunter series.

You are a monster hunter, protecting the balance of the ecosystem and hunting monsters in a world with dynamic, ever-changing environments. Use the resources you gain from hunts to craft ever more powerful weapons and armor in your quest to unravel the mysteries of the new lands.

Experience the most evolved action and improved immersion in the series in Monster Hunter Wilds, available now on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC/Steam!

#MHWilds #MonsterHunter #FF
title: Monster Hunter Wilds - Free Title Update 3: Final Fantasy XIV Special Collaboration Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
From the creators of DEADLY PREMONITION + NO MORE HEROES. A marshal possessed by a murderer. A hotel full of killers. CHECK IN, WIPE ‘EM OUT.

Hotel Barcelona releases on Sep 26, 2025.

- Director of Photography by Mark Lentz
- Co-produced by Badvertising
- Special thanks to Scott Popular & Kyle Hovanec
title: Hotel Barcelona - Suda51's Cheeseburger Launch Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
Hades 2 exits early access as a finely-honed and deeply engaging roguelite that builds upon the strong foundations established by the first game. It's larger in every way, with more characters and conversations to enjoy, an entirely new roster of weapons to learn, and deeper customization options to its expanded combat system, yet none of these upgrades compromise Hades' legacy. Rather, Hades 2 improves upon its predecessor in every way, making it a masterfully crafted sequel that is essential to play.

#gaming #hadesii
title: Hades 2 Review

author: GameSpot
description: We get a short gameplay overview and what to expect of Resident Evil Requiem at TGS 2025. Those attending TGS 2025 can play the demo on PS5, PC, Laptop, and even try their hands at the game on Switch 2.
title: Resident Evil Requiem Gameplay Overview | Capcom Online Program TGS 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
C. Viper has completed the improvements to her spy gadgets and experiments with the Drive Gauge.

The research director's only conclusion is her victory when she arrives in #StreetFighter6 on October 15!

C. Viper can be purchased individually with Fighter Coins and the owners of the Year 3 Character Pass / Ultimate Pass will automatically get access to C. Viper when she releases.

#StreetFighter6 #SF6 #Capcom #CViper
title: Street Fighter 6 - C. Viper Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
Final Fantasy Tactics is a formative game in the tactical RPG genre, and still  one of the greatest. Its unforgettable story has never been better told thanks to a retouched translation, stellar voice acting, and smart new tools to help track all of the palace intrigue. The Ivalice Chronicles lacks a few nice-to-have features, but it's easily the best way to play this all-time classic.

Credits:  Steve watts, Max B, Richard Li

#gamespot  #finalfantasy
title: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles Review

author: GameSpot
description:
Pokemon Legends: Z-A is a big shakeup for the long running series. After two hands-one previews, here are the biggest changes we’ve found so far.

#gamespot #pokemon
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A - 22 Biggest Changes

author: GameSpot
description:
After an extended hands-on preview, Pokemon Legends: Z-A could be a leap forward for the long-running series.

#gaming #pokemon
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A Takes The Series In A Bold Direction

author: GameSpot
description: Get a brief glimpse of a behind the scenes trailer for Stranger Than Heaven from Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio that was showcased during the RGG Summit 2025.
title: Stranger Than Heaven Behind The Scenes Trailer | RGG Summit 2025

author: GameSpot
description: We get a new reveal for Dark Ties which will feature Yoshitaka Mine as the main protagonist of the story. Dark Ties will be released as a package with Yakuza Kiwami 3. You can choose to play Dark Ties or Yakuza Kiwami 3 from the start.
title: Yakuza Kiwami 3 Dark Ties Trailer | RGG Summit 2025

author: GameSpot
description: Check out Yakuza Kiwami 3 which was showcased at the RGG Summit 2025.
title: Yakuza Kiwami 3 Trailer | RGG Summit 2025
